name: Kubus (DigitalOasis)
description:
"Kubus" is a puzzle adventure game where you traverse a world where each plane is attached to sides of cubes and your goal is to defeat enemies, solve puzzles, and spin/rotate the world around you to reach the end.

Development Progress:

-A demo level has been completed showcasing the basic mechanics of navigating the cube and solving each side's puzzle to reach the goal plane.
